alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 3:31PM EDT until May 16 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Estill County in east central Kentucky... Central Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waneta, or near McKee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Foxtown around 335 PM EDT. Lakes around 340 PM EDT. New Zion around 345 PM EDT. Earnestville around 350 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Delvinta and Levi. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
